text: Saša Radulović (, ; born 4 April 1984) is a Serbian football forward who plays for Kopaonik Brus in Serbian League East. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:Serbian footballers Category:FK BSK Borča players Category:FK Radnički Niš players Category:FK Napredak Kruševac players Category:Serbian SuperLiga players Category:Serbian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Austria Category:SV Spittal players
title: Saša Radulović (footballer, born 1984)
